page.title: 09ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: Much of the entertainment in our area is organised by the Community Councils,Plas Madoc Leisure Centre,local clubs,churches and chapels.The Councils organise fucnctions which are held in village halls.Local operatic societies perform musical concerts and plays.The senior citizens meet there once a week as do other clubs.Plas Madoc Leisure Centre has many indoor sports amenities as well as providing organised evening functions,concerts,plays and dances. In addition many of the preliminary tests for the Llangollen International Eisteddfod are held there.Froncysyllte Male Voice Choir sponsored an International Music evening for the visitors.Youth clubs are held in each village.Guides and Brownie meetings are held weekly.Clubs eg. British Leigion provide organised functions.
